title: Jack Andrew
text: Jack Andrew is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Cornish%20Pirates">Cornish Pirates</a>. He went to <a href="Exeter%20Chiefs">Exeter Chiefs</a> from their academy in the summer of 2010. He joined the pirates in the summer 2013 His position of choice is <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">Prop</a>. Jack attended <a href="The%20Roseland%20Community%20College">The Roseland Community College</a> in <a href="Tregony">Tregony</a>, Cornwall until 2007 where he then joined <a href="Truro%20College">Truro College</a>.
